title: Forest Apartment Escape Near Daylesford
description: Get family and friends together for a relaxing apartment stay at The Sebel Creswick Forest Resort, a private retreat nestled between the charming city of Ballarat and the mineral springs, country pubs, cider breweries, sprawling wineries and breathtaking scenery of Daylesford and Hepburn Springs.

title: Charming Forest Apartment Escape Near Daylesford
description: Get away from it all for a relaxing apartment stay at The Sebel Creswick Forest Resort, a private retreat nestled between the charming city of Ballarat and the nearby mineral springs. Immerse yourself in all the region has to offer: cosy country pubs, sprawling wineries and the breathtaking scenery of Daylesford and Hepburn Springs. Stay in a palatial two-bedroom apartment, perfect for up to four people and enjoy a leisurely late 11am checkout and an Experience Passport entitling you to exclusive discounts.

title: Charming Self-Contained Apartments near Daylesford & Hepburn Springs
description:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city with a relaxing apartment stay at The Sebel Creswick Forest Resort, a private retreat nestled between the charming city of Ballarat and the mineral waters of Hepburn Springs. Surrounded by acres of lush greenery, this peaceful resort is the perfect group getaway, where you can quite literally do as much or as little as you want, with gourmet dining options and local attractions within easy reach. The neighbouring RACV Goldfields Resort welcomes guests to their bar and restaurant, serving the finest local produce and cocktails alongside golf-course views and occasional live music.

Creswick is well known for its walking and cycling trails, cosy pubs, quaint cafés, and forested landscape that you could spend hours exploring. Further afield, you can sample a local tipple at Daylesford Cider Company, marvel at artworks at the Convent Gallery, soar above the ground with a hot air balloon adventure or indulge with a treatment at EKO Spa in Daylesford. Of course, there are also the hot springs in Hepburn Springs to keep you warm on a cool day.

title: Victorian Spa Country Escape with Daily Breakfast and Golf Discounts
description:
Whether you’re looking for a quiet couples’ retreat near Daylesford’s blissful Mineral Spa, an active family-friendly escape immersed in nature or a chance to tee off at one of Victoria’s best forest courses, you are sure to enjoy a lovely escape to RACV Goldfields Resort - nestled amid the historic bushland of Creswick. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink per person, guaranteed late 12pm checkout and 25% discount on Golf Green Fees throughout your stay.

Are you an RACV Member? Enjoy a bottle of wine and a complimentary round of golf with club and cart hire included.

title: Victorian Spa Country Getaway
description: Whether you’re looking for a quiet couples’ retreat near Daylesford’s blissful Mineral Spa, an active family-friendly escape immersed in nature or a chance to tee off at one of Victoria’s best forest courses; you’re sure to enjoy a lovely escape to RACV Goldfields Resort. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, welcome drinks for two, guaranteed late 12pm checkout and discounts on Golf Green Fees and spa treatments.

title: Victorian Spa Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Strike getaway gold with an escape to RACV Goldfields Resort, a family-friendly countryside retreat perfectly located between Creswick’s storied bushland and the spectacular natural hot springs of Daylesford and Hepburn. Though only a little over an hour’s drive from Melbourne, you’ll feel worlds away at this polished resort - upgrade to the Fairway Room (for up to two adults and two children) and explore Victoria’s soul-stirring natural beauty together or go for the Premium Fairway Suite, perfect for couples, and embrace the setting’s regional romance. Naturally, bonus inclusions await loyal RACV members.

There’s plenty to see and do - take a swing at the resort’s 18-hole golf course, sample the region’s renowned local honey, chocolate and fine spirits or enjoy laid-back, family-friendly dining at Three Founders and first-class local drops at Springs Bar & Terrace. The region is renowned for its plethora of mineral spas and natural hot springs. Be sure to visit nearby Hepburn Bathhouse & Spa, Daylesford Day Spa & Beauty or acclaimed The Mineral Spa as part of your stay.
